RECORD.lx: The cruel man abandoned his wife and child. 那个狠心的男人抛弃了他的妻儿。 They had abandoned all hope. 他们已经放弃了一切希望。

Scratch the subject of defence and acronym, abbreviation, and buzzwords fly out. 话题触及国防，缩合字，缩写字和行话就满天飞。 An abbreviation for formula calculation language, a high-level programming language not too widely used. 公式计算语言的简称，应用不太广泛的一种高级程序设计语言。

RECORD.meaning: n．腹，下腹（胸部到腿部的部份）
RECORD.lx: The spider has a bulgy abdomen. 蜘蛛长着凸出的腹部。 He always feels pain in his abdomen. 他的腹部经常疼痛。
Everyone must abide by the law. 所有的人都应遵守法律。 She can't abide that man. 她不能忍受那个人。
The weather is abnormal this year. 今年的气候不正常。 An abnormal fear of high places. 恐高症对于高处的一种不正常的恐惧

An Australian aboriginal dance festival held at night to celebrate tribal victories or other events./r 狂欢会澳大利亚土著的一种舞蹈节，在晚上召开以庆祝部落胜利或其他事件/r Any of the languages of the aboriginal peoples of Australia./ 澳洲土著语任何澳洲土著民族的语言
Tropical plants abound in the jungle. 丛林中有大量的热带植物。 He abounds in courage. 他很有胆量。

An implement with cutting edges or a pointed end for boring holes in hard materials, usually by a rotating abrasion or repeated blows; a bit. 钻带切割刃或尖端的工具，用于在坚硬材料上钻孔，一般靠旋转磨损或反复击打实现钻孔 A minor scratch or abrasion. 擦伤一个轻微的擦伤或磨损
It was abridged from the original work. 这是原书的节录本。 This is an abridged edition of "war and peace". 这是“战争与和平”的节略版。
He has some abstract notion of wanting to change the world. 他有一种要改造世界的空想。 We may talk of beautiful things, but beauty itself is abstract. 我们尽可谈论美的事物，然而美本身却是抽象的。
What an absurd suggestion! 多荒谬的建议啊！ It was absurd of you to suggest such a thing. 你居然建议这样的事，太可笑了。
There was an abundance of corn last year. 去年玉米丰收。 The state of being profuse; abundance. 丰富极其丰富的状态；充沛
It's easy to abuse one's power. 人容易滥用权力。 They talked about how the uses and abuses of figures to prove things in politics. 他们谈到人们如何在政治问题上使用及滥用数字来混淆视听。
The car accelerated as it overtook me. 那辆汽车一加速就超越了我. The leader is losing ground as the rest of the runners accelerate. 领先者在其余赛跑者加速时就逐渐失去了优势。
The tight jumper only accentuated his fat stomach. 那件紧身套头毛衣反更突出了他那肥胖的肚子.
Citizens may have free access to the library. 市民可以免费使用这个图书馆。 He is a man of easy access. 他是一个很好接近的人。
A manager should be accessible to his staff. 一个管理人员应该让职员感到平易近人。 This island is accessible only by boat. 这个小岛只能坐小船去。
Our meeting was quite accidental. 我们的相遇是很偶然的。 A sequence of events that although accidental seems to have been planned or arranged. 巧合，凑巧虽是偶然的，但似乎是经计划或安排的一系列事件
Acclaim or praise for exceptional achievement. 名声，威信对杰出成就所作的称赞或颂扬 A person of remarkable talent or ability who achieves great success or acclaim at an early age. 少年得志因早年具有非凡的才智和能力而获得极大成功或受到称赞的人
He was accorded a warm welcome. 他受到热烈的欢迎。 He joined the army of his own accord. 他自愿参军。
